name: reed organic tunic
description:
This organic cotton knit top features a scoop neckline, raw edges, and a beautiful knotted pattern on the back. This tunic/top can also be shortened 5 inches to fit the size of a regular tee if desired, just let me know.

This top is made out of a beautiful and elegant sheer organic cotton that has been weathered to create a vintage softness and a gauzy look. The raw edges were designed to enhance the weathered look of this top

Very modern, elegant yet casual, sophisticated, edgy, and most importantly, comfortable.

Available in XS, S, M, or L in natural off-white, vintage rose, green moss, and earth brown.

Make sure to leave me a message saying what size you want your garment in. For a slim fit, choose the size that best fits you from the size chart below (these are body measurements), for a looser fit, choose a size up :

x-small
bust 32
waist 25
hips 35

small
bust 34
waist 27
hips 37

medium
bust 36
waist 29
hips 39

large
bust 38
waist 32
hips 42

We welcome custom orders that incorporate any of the embellishments of our other tops, although costs may vary. Please keep in mind that modified orders are not refundable or exchangeable.

Send me a conversation if you have any questions...

Thank you for looking!

name: caoba organic top
description:
Handmade out of quality stretchy organic cotton knit.

It features a scoop neckline, raw edges, and a low back. Remnant fabric is cut shapes of leaves and sewn to add interest to the top. The top also includes two strings to tie on the back (not shown in images) in case you want a more casual look, but you easily hide them for a more elegant look.

This top can be worn with the leaves on the back for an sexy, yet elegant look or on front for a more classy look. Very comfortable and easy to dress up or down.

Available in XS, S, M, L, or XL in the natural color shown.

Make sure to leave me a message saying what size you want your garment in. Choose the size that best fits you from the size chart below (these are body measurements):

x-small
bust 32
waist 25
hips 35

small
bust 34
waist 27
hips 37

medium
bust 36
waist 29
hips 39

large
bust 38
waist 32
hips 42

x-large

We can always custom-make your order if you don't fall in any of these categories, but please note that custom or modified orders are not refundable or exchangeable.

Send me a conversation if you have any questions...

Thank you for looking!

name: petals organic tank top
description:
This organic cotton knit tank top features an arrangement of petals. The body of this top is made out of a beautiful and elegant sheer organic cotton that has been weathered to create a gauzy softness and vintage look.

Very elegant yet casual, sophisticated, and most importantly, comfortable.

Available in XS, S, M, or L in natural off-white, vintage rose, green moss, and earth brown, but always with the golden petals.

name: plumavera wrap
description:
This long sleeve wrap features flower arrangements on the front and back. The wrap comes in different colors, but the flower appliqu√©s will be the off-white color shown in the pictures to add an extra dimension to the wrap.

This wrap is made out of a beautiful, vintage soft pima cotton and comes with hemmed edges. This warp is extremely versatile, and can be worn in various different ways as shown in the images.

Very elegant yet casual, sophisticated, and most importantly, comfortable.

Available in S, M, or L in beige, cocoa brown, black, or slate blue.
